nodes.message: If Esme Rep >= 75 or Aeolus Rep >= 60

nodes.text: Hey, Aeolus - it's not the end of the world. Your best music comes from your heart even when it's broken. Try to put your grief to music. You'll be the greatest bard at this school.
<shrug>
Esme is a great girl with great taste in men - that's why she picked me and not you.
Hey, Aeolus - it's not the end of the world. Your best music comes from your heart even when it's broken. Try to put your grief to music. You'll be the greatest bard at this school.
<shrug>

Face it, Aeolus - you're just too weird for people here. Do you really expect people to fall in love with you because you write songs about them? Love is more than pretty words - there needs to be a pretty face to go with it.
<shrug>

options.text: Tell Aeolus that You Love Him

nodes.text: Aeolus, I really want you to know that I care deeply for you. Very deeply.
<shrug>
I was wondering if you'd ever feel like writing a song for me?
Why?
Well, you write songs for everyone you really like... I just wondered if you could ever... um... feel like that for me?
Do you have a crush on me? Why didn't you tell me before this?
I really like you, too. I just never thought you'd be interested in me.
Let me think over the idea of you and me together. Maybe I could come up with a tune or two for you.
You like me like that? I didn't know you were interested in me. I've only thought of you as a good friend. I'll have to think this over. It's kind of a shock.
Sorry, Shawn. I'll be your friend, sure. Other than that... I think it's a little late to talk about flowers and romance between us.
You've lied to me. You've gone out of your way to hurt my feelings. You're not a very nice guy, Shawn. I don't want your love. Find someone else to hurt.
I don't like you, Shawn. I've tried to be your friend, but that's as far as I'm willing to go with this.
I don't think so, Shawn. You're just not the nicest of people at times. Yeah, I may fall in love too easily, but I've got to like the person first.
Esme is a wonderful woman. She's just not the right woman for you. Just wait - the right woman will come along who will want to follow your dreams.
<shrug>

options.text: Say Esme Wasn't Good Enough for Aeolus

nodes.text: Esme can't be very bright if she doesn't realize by now what a great guy you are. You need someone as witty as clever as you are for a partner, not just a pretty face.
You're a lot more than a pretty face, Shawn.
<shrug>

You know, Aeolus - just because Esme isn't madly in love with you right now doesn't mean you can't win her heart. You should talk to her. Let her get to know you better. Do nice things for her. That's the right way to woo someone.
You think she'll change her mind about me?
Worth a try, isn't it?
<shrug>

options.text: Say Esme was Too Good for Aeolus

nodes.text: Esme is a very sweet and delicate girl. She needs a man who will protect her and be there for her. You aren't the dependable sort who will give Esme the security she craves. She deserves better than you.
<shrug>

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: It would be really great if you'd clean up this room.
<shrug>
If this room gets any messier, we won't have to worry about being expelled from school - we'll be trapped in here forever behind a wall of junk. You really got to clean this place up.
Right... I'll clean up.
<shrug>
Sweet Dreams.
I'll dream of you.
I've got a lot to think about...
Try to get some rest.
<shrug>

nodes.message: Shawn Loves Esme, but Esme doesn't Love Shawn

nodes.text: So why do you sound so upbeat today?
I talked to Esme this evening. I told her how much I care about her. Then I asked if she'd go out on a date with me sometime.
What did she say?
She said that she'd be happy to go with me.
So you are trying to come between me and Esme?
Not really. The only thing between you and Esme is your fantasy. Esme thinks I'm cute.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Back Off Esme

nodes.text: Esme is my girl. You're crazy if you think she'd like you better than she likes me.
Maybe you should talk to Esme sometime and see how she feels about you.
Stay away from her!
Oooh, or what?

You had your chance and you done her wrong. 
I'll woo her with words and I'll sway her with song. 
The affection between us will soon be strong,
So all you can do is run along.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that He's Making a Mistake With Esme

nodes.text: You'll be sorry if you think that Esme is the right one for you. She's nothing like you. You should find someone who shares your enthusiasm for music.
I'll be the judge of that.

options.text: Tell Aeolus that Esme has Secrets (Smarts)

nodes.text: You don't know what Esme is really like. All you see is her pretty face and her body. There's a dark side to Esme. She's a very scary lady.
You're just saying that to try to scare me off.
So you think... but you'll see. She's got secrets that will chill your soul.
I don't care what you say about Esme. I love her and I will stand by her no matter what.

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: If you are so full of energy - why don't you clean up the room?
Why should I spoil my good mood by doing something to please you?

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Go to Sleep

nodes.text: You can stop playing thost panpipes and go to sleep now.
Sounds like things are going well for you.

It may sound academic, 
but Esme is angelic,
and I'm copacetic.
So have you talked to Esme yet?
I haven't just talked to Esme; I danced with her! And I didn't step on her feet or trip over my feet. It was so enchanting!

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: As long as you are in a good mood, why don't you clean up the room?
I'll get around to it as soon as I can spare the time.
Good night and sleep tight.
Everything will work out right!
